sqlMap.select:
SELECT MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL
ORDER BY SEQ_NO

SELECT MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#
#chkStatuss[]#
ORDER BY SEQ_NO

SELECT MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# AND SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# AND SEQ_NO > #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND CHK_STATUS IN ('02','04') AND ROWNUM = 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL ( MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD ) VALUES ( #msgId:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #reportCode:CHAR#, #submitDate:VARCHAR#, #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, #amount:DECIMAL#, #currency:CHAR#, #accountNo:VARCHAR#, #accountName:VARCHAR#, #institutionCode:VARCHAR#, #swiftCode:CHAR#, #countryCode:CHAR#, #districtCode:CHAR#, #tranType:CHAR#, #termLength:DECIMAL#, #termUnit:CHAR#, #tranDate:VARCHAR#, #expirationDate:VARCHAR#, #interestRate:DECIMAL#, #exchangeType:CHAR#, #buyCurr:CHAR#, #buyAmt:DECIMAL#, #buyRate:DECIMAL#, #sellCurr:CHAR#, #sellAmt:DECIMAL#, #sellRate:DECIMAL#, #bondsCode:VARCHAR#, #bondsName:VARCHAR#, #interestType:CHAR#, #benchmark:CHAR#, #floatRate:DECIMAL#, #termCondition:CHAR#, #lgType:CHAR#, #tranGenre:CHAR#, #chkStatus:CHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#, #makUserId:VARCHAR#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkAddWord:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL SET MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#, MAK_DATETIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#
SUBMIT_DATE = #submitDate:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #amount:DECIMAL#
CURRENCY = #currency:CHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#
COUNTRY_CODE = #countryCode:CHAR#
DISTRICT_CODE = #districtCode:CHAR#
TRAN_TYPE = #tranType:CHAR#
TERM_LENGTH = #termLength:DECIMAL#
TERM_UNIT = #termUnit:CHAR#
TRAN_DATE = #tranDate:VARCHAR#
EXPIRATION_DATE = #expirationDate:VARCHAR#
INTEREST_RATE = #interestRate:DECIMAL#
BONDS_CODE = #bondsCode:VARCHAR#
BONDS_NAME = #bondsName:VARCHAR#
INTEREST_TYPE = #interestType:CHAR#
BENCHMARK = #benchmark:CHAR#
FLOAT_RATE = #floatRate:DECIMAL#
TERM_CONDITION = #termCondition:VARCHAR#
ACC_ORG_CODE = #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#
SWIFT_CODE = #swiftCode:VARCHAR#
LG_TYPE = #lgType:CHAR#
EXCHANGE_TYPE = #exchangeType:CHAR#
BUY_CURR = #buyCurr:CHAR#
BUY_AMT = #buyAmt:DECIMAL#
BUY_RATE = #buyRate:DECIMAL#
SELL_CURR = #sellCurr:CHAR#
SELL_AMT = #sellAmt:DECIMAL#
SELL_RATE = #sellRate:DECIMAL#
TRAN_GENRE = #tranGenre:CHAR#
WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# AND SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND (MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:CHAR# OR MAK_DATETIME IS NULL) AND (CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:CHAR# OR CHK_DATETIME IS NULL)

UPDATE FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL SET CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#
CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, CHK_DATETIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
CHK_ADD_WORD = #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#
WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#
SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND CHK_STATUS = #oldChkStatus:CHAR# AND (MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:CHAR# OR MAK_DATETIME IS NULL) AND (CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:CHAR# OR CHK_DATETIME IS NULL)
sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO), 0) + 1, 6, '0') FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL WHERE MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# AND SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:CHAR# AND (CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR# OR CHK_DATETIME IS NULL)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL ( MSG_ID, SEQ_NO, REPORT_CODE, SUBMIT_DATE, ACC_ORG_CODE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT_NAME, INSTITUTION_CODE, SWIFT_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, TRAN_TYPE, TERM_LENGTH, TERM_UNIT, TRAN_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, EXCHANGE_TYPE, BUY_CURR, BUY_AMT, BUY_RATE, SELL_CURR, SELL_AMT, SELL_RATE, BONDS_CODE, BONDS_NAME, INTEREST_TYPE, BENCHMARK, FLOAT_RATE, TERM_CONDITION, LG_TYPE, TRAN_GENRE, CHK_STATUS, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD ) VALUES ( #msgId:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #reportCode:CHAR#, #submitDate:VARCHAR#, #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, #amount:DECIMAL#, #currency:CHAR#, #accountNo:VARCHAR#, #accountName:VARCHAR#, #institutionCode:VARCHAR#, #swiftCode:CHAR#, #countryCode:CHAR#, #districtCode:CHAR#, #tranType:CHAR#, #termLength:DECIMAL#, #termUnit:CHAR#, #tranDate:VARCHAR#, #expirationDate:VARCHAR#, #interestRate:DECIMAL#, #exchangeType:CHAR#, #buyCurr:CHAR#, #buyAmt:DECIMAL#, #buyRate:DECIMAL#, #sellCurr:CHAR#, #sellAmt:DECIMAL#, #sellRate:DECIMAL#, #bondsCode:VARCHAR#, #bondsName:VARCHAR#, #interestType:CHAR#, #benchmark:CHAR#, #floatRate:DECIMAL#, #termCondition:CHAR#, #lgType:CHAR#, #tranGenre:CHAR#, #chkStatus:CHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#, #makUserId:VARCHAR#, #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkAddWord:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update:
update FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL
REPORT_CODE = #reportCode:CHAR#
SUBMIT_DATE = #submitDate:VARCHAR#
ACC_ORG_CODE = #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #amount:DECIMAL#
CURRENCY = #currency:CHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#
INSTITUTION_CODE = #institutionCode:VARCHAR#
SWIFT_CODE = #swiftCode:CHAR#
COUNTRY_CODE = #countryCode:CHAR#
DISTRICT_CODE = #districtCode:CHAR#
TRAN_TYPE = #tranType:CHAR#
TERM_LENGTH = #termLength:DECIMAL#
TERM_UNIT = #termUnit:CHAR#
TRAN_DATE = #tranDate:VARCHAR#
EXPIRATION_DATE = #expirationDate:VARCHAR#
INTEREST_RATE = #interestRate:DECIMAL#
EXCHANGE_TYPE = #exchangeType:CHAR#
BUY_CURR = #buyCurr:CHAR#
BUY_AMT = #buyAmt:DECIMAL#
BUY_RATE = #buyRate:DECIMAL#
SELL_CURR = #sellCurr:CHAR#
SELL_AMT = #sellAmt:DECIMAL#
SELL_RATE = #sellRate:DECIMAL#
BONDS_CODE = #bondsCode:VARCHAR#
BONDS_NAME = #bondsName:VARCHAR#
INTEREST_TYPE = #interestType:CHAR#
BENCHMARK = #benchmark:CHAR#
FLOAT_RATE = #floatRate:DECIMAL#
TERM_CONDITION = #termCondition:CHAR#
LG_TYPE = #lgType:CHAR#
TRAN_GENRE = #tranGenre:CHAR#
CHK_STATUS = #chkStatus:CHAR#
MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#
MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#
CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#
CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#
CHK_ADD_WORD = #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#
where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
and MAK_DATETIME = #rsv1:VARCHAR#
and CHK_DATETIME = #rsv2:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from FTZ_OFF_TXN_DTL where MSG_ID = #msgId:VARCHAR# and SEQ_NO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
